## R Markdown

In this project, I want to visualize countries environmental performance index (EPI) and extend that to land cover & loss over the years and see if any trends emerge. I want to enabble people to browse by country too.

Data set: Yale Center for Environmental Law and Policy - YCELP - Yale University, Center for International Earth Science Information Network - CIESIN - Columbia University, and World Economic Forum - WEF. 2018. 2018 Environmental Performance Index (EPI). Palisades, NY: NASA Socioeconomic Data and Applications Center (SEDAC). https://doi.org/10.7927/H4X928CF.
